title: Update 'Clan Eyes' worldbuilding rules (add controllable activation + awareness caveat for the trio)

requirements.text: Update the 'Clan Eyes' rules content in `frontend/src/content/animeSiteConfig.ts` so that the 5th rule states that activation is controllable, but not for the trio yet, and add a 6th rule stating that characters are completely aware when they have control, but the trio is not yet.

quotes: in clan eyes for the 5th one take out say activation is controllable but not for the trio and for the 6th one  the characters are completely aware if they have control but the trio not yet.

acceptanceCriteria: The 5th item communicates: activation is controllable, but not for the trio yet.
The 6th item communicates: characters who have control are completely aware of activation, but the trio is not yet.
The Worldbuilding section 'Clan Eyes' bullet list renders all 6 rules in order.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Do not change any files listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change layout/styling of the Worldbuilding section.
Do not add new backend functionality or persistence changes.
